data.text: Ma e wach mar Jehova Nyasaye mane obiro ne Zefania wuod Kushi, ma wuod Gedalia, ma wuod Amaria, ma wuod Hezekia e kinde loch Josia wuod Amon ruodh Juda.
Bende abiro tieko ji duto makulore ewi tat udi
Ji duto moseweyo luwo Jehova Nyasaye,
Lingʼuru e nyim Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto;
“E odiechiengʼ mitimoe misango mar Jehova Nyasaye
Gouru nduru un joma odak e mier moluoro chiro,
E ndalono abiro menyo Jerusalem gi teche
To bende enobed odiechieng turumbete kod sigich mar lweny
“Abiro kelo luoro kod achiedh-nade kuom oganda
To kata mana fedha mathoth kod dhahabu ma gin-go
